mapper.select: select img, sn_num, subject, input_date from (select s.s_num, ut.img from study s, user_table ut where s_num=#{ sNum } AND s.id = ut.id) ss, study_notice sn where sn.s_num = #{ sNum } order by input_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into SN_COMMENT (SN_NUM, SN_COMMENT, ID) values(#{ snNum },#{ snComment} ,#{ id })
mapper.select: SELECT nick, m.id FROM user_table u, member m WHERE m.s_num=#{ id } AND m.id = u.id
